description: Pgbouncer dashboard for Grafana integrated with Percona PMM as well.

panels.description: Maximum connections to Postgres Database
panels.title: Pool Size

panels.description: Maximum number of allowed connections per-database
panels.title: Max DB Conn

panels.description: Maximum number of allowed connections per-database
panels.title: Max Client Conn

panels.description: Maximum number of allowed connections per-database
panels.title: Max User Conn

panels.description: Server connections that are linked to a client.
panels.title: Active Client Connections

panels.description: Total number of per-database Database connections count
panels.title: Current conn on DB

panels.description: Server connections that have been idle for more than `server_check_delay`, so they need `server_check_query` to run on them before they can be used again.
panels.title: Server Used Conn

panels.description: Server connections that are unused and immediately usable for client queries.
panels.title: Server Idle

panels.description: Server connections that are currently running either `server_reset_query` or `server_check_query`.
panels.title: Server Tested Conn

panels.description: Server connections that are linked to a client.
panels.title: Clients Active

panels.description: How long the first (oldest) client in queue has waited, in seconds
panels.title: Client Waiting

panels.description: Total number of SQL transactions pooled by pgbouncer
panels.title: Total SQL Transactions Pooled

panels.description: Server connections that are linked to a client.
panels.title: Active Client Connections(Per User)

panels.description: Server connections that are linked to a client.
panels.title: Idle Client Connections(Per User)

panels.description: Total number of SQL queries pooled by pgbouncer
panels.title: Total  Queries Pooled

panels.description: Server connections currently in logging in process
panels.title: Server Conn Logging in process

panels.description: Total number of microseconds spent waiting for a server to return a query response. Includes time spent waiting for an available connection.
panels.title: Queries Duration

panels.description: Total number of microseconds spent waiting for an available connection
panels.title: Total Waiting

panels.description: Client connections have sent queries but have not yet got a server connection
panels.title: Waiting for Server Conn

panels.description: Total volume in bytes of network traffic sent / received by pgbouncer
panels.title: Total of incoming / outgoing bytes

title: PgBouncer Database dashboard
